Desc.entry: A registered charity which delivers programmes to Beighton, Mosborough and Woodhouse wards. However, if an applicant is looking for funding for a larger area, (which includes the above wards) this can be discussed further with the Regeneration Manager. Has two types of application, the first is a small Community Chest called Bridging the Gap for applications £500 - £5000. Only voluntary/community groups can apply and it is only available once within a 12 month period. Limited opportunities are available for larger grants, please contact for further details. Company limited by guarantee no 03738566.
